overview:
Alexander M. Orlando, Executive Vice President Global Innovation at InnoCrowding, has worked many roles in the past:

Director Open Innovation - Gov. Sector: at Innocentive

Vice President Products & Business Development: at Clarity Visual Intelligence

VP International Division: at VIEW SYSTEMS

Director Business Development: at Honeywell Automation and Control Solutions

With almost 20 years in B2B and B2G marketing he has shown a track record of successful campaigns and initiatives.

He also has experience in:

Enterprise Software Solutions, IT and physical security, open innovation â€“ product development. Indirect Sales: OEM/VAR, rep groups, & channel partners. Direct Sales: Fortune 500, Government.

Authored:

The Colors Influence on Purchasing Behavior (1998), The World is Your Market (1999), Corporate Culture and Interrelations of Mix Miscommunication (1999), Mobile Solid-State Security Systems (2001), Security Post September 11 (2002), PSIM for Intelligent Video Deployments (2002), Understanding MPEG4 (2003), Outsourcing Technology Projects (2004), Understanding Prosumers (2007), Open Innovation S.M.A.R.T. Model (2007), InnoCrowding: Open Innovation 2.0 (2009)
